title: FS: Lot of (45) T206 Cards including Nap Lajoie with bat!
author: SetBuilder

posts.post_title: FS: Lot of (45) T206 Cards including Nap Lajoie with bat!
posts.post_content:
For sale are 45 T206 cards including the HOFer Nap Lajoie with bat. The condition range is about 40% Poor, 50% Good, and 10% VG. Most have creases and imperfections. All are Piedmont and SC backs, and 1 Sovereign Back. Excuse the Image Resolution, it got compressed on upload.
 
(5 Card Minimum For Free Ship Please! If not, add $1.50 S&H PER CARD) 
 
List of Cards with Individual Prices:
 
1. Nap Lajoie with Bat (Piedmont 350) $130
